"Binary Sync"

Thursday, July 29, 2021
p5.js, p5.sound.js

Mapping audio data to binary visuals to create audio reactive art.

  • Fullscreen View

Click the empty black box below to start the visuals. Move your mouse up and down to change the cutoff threshold for white and dark lines.

Music: Another Wave Spiral Universe by Humanfobia

Visuals are being rendered real-time processing of audio data to create dynamic visuals.
